channel.title: [513] Background change... [513]
channel.description: okay, i want to know, how do you change the background, because i have a 513 with a weird background, but i want to keep the client because it has custom hp bars =P. but i want to know how to change the background to normal background or something else... the original owner of the client won't tell me a thing... i haven't spoken to the other coder, but i want to know if there is a tutorial somewhere i haven't looked. (used search Bar)(google found nothing) and i dont want to check 5 million pages for 1 little code. And i dont want you guys either but i would like it if you knew a website with tut already on it. plz help =p

item.title: [513] Background change... [513]

item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

np =/ but there is a sprite.dat and sprite.idx and the .dat wont open in the dat file and wont open in anything else exept notepad and it looks funky. and i dont know how to open up the .idx file.
